mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BILL_FILE ORDER BY BILL_PRIOR ASC

SELECT CONCAT( 'BILL' ,LPAD(IFNULL(MAX( SUBSTR(BILL_FILE_ID,5,2) ),-1)+1,2,'0') ,DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m%d') ) FROM BILL_FILE a WHERE 1=1 AND REG_DT >= CURDATE() AND REG_DT < CURDATE() + INTERVAL 1 DAY

SELECT CONCAT( 'MANUAL' ,LPAD(IFNULL( MAX( CAST(SUBSTR(BILL_ID,7,2) AS UNSIGNED) ),-1)+1,2,'0') ,DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m%d') ) FROM bill_snd a WHERE 1=1 AND SND_DT >= CURDATE() AND SND_DT < CURDATE() + INTERVAL 1 DAY
SELECT * FROM FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_ORIGIN = ( SELECT BILL_FILE_ID FROM bill_file WHERE BILL_PRIOR = 1 )
